QuestData.Title: Motes
QuestData.Description: Some of the rarest crystals form in the most dangerous places. In the Crumbling Depths, you will find painite formations - much better than the gold that your races cherish so much.$B$BAs a being of flesh and a being of small stature, you can enter the Crumbling Depths to retrieve motes of painite for me. Would you undergo that danger on my behalf?
